Title: Relates to designated suppliers and authorized distributors of nonprescription blood glucose self-testing equipment, devices and supplies
Summary: Requires manufacturer of nonprescription blood glucose self-testing equipment, devices and supplies to submit to the New York State Board of Pharmacy a comprehensive list of designated suppliers and authorized distributors of nonprescription blood glucose self-testing equipment, devices and supplies; prohibits pharmacists from distributing nonprescription blood glucose self-testing equipment, devices, and supplies or seeking reimbursement therefor when the pharmacist knows or has reason to know that the equipment did not come through an authorized supplier or distributor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to designated suppliers and authorized distributors of nonprescription blood glucose self-testing equipment, devices and supplies
